fields.name: Starter package
fields.description: Getting started is always difficult, let me help you with this starter package

fields.name: Plus package
fields.description:
Find out what people want and give it to them sounds so easy.
                    However, that is actually the hardest part of creating a truly customer-centric service. 
                    Luckily i can help you with that

fields.name: Premium package
fields.description: To create a service that people love, you need to stay in touch with your users throughout the development process, from start to finish.
